WorkItem.Description:
The Microsoft.Windows.Shell namespace in the WPF Shell Integration Library is no longer needed as it is implemented in System.Windows and System.Windows.Shell in .NET 4.5. I have fixed the changes without the use of the Integration Library. The modified files are attatched below.

Classes used and implemented into .NET 4.5:
SystemParameters - Implemented in System.Windows
SystemParameters2 - Merged with SystemParameters
WindowChrome - Implemented in System.Windows.Shell
